description: The main application of the SENTINEL-3 topography mission is the study of ocean topography including mean sea level, wave height, wind speed over the surface, sea-ice, ocean currents, Kelvin and Rossby waves, eddies and tides. The geophysical parameters to be measured by the SENTINEL-3 topography mission are: Sea Surface Height (SSH), Significant Wave Height (SWH), Wind Speed over ocean surface. The Level-2 SRAL/MWR complete product contains three files in netCDF format: one reduced data file, one standard data file and one enhanced data file.
title: Level 2 Land - SRAL/MWR  - Sentinel-3
